content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal extraction setup at position (y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position y1) for coal extraction
- Belt (position y2) that connects the burner mining drill to the furnace at position x1

### Iron plate factory at position (z)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) for crafting iron plates
- Inserter (position z2) that puts iron plates into the assembling machine
- Belt (position z3) that connects the furnace at position x1 to the assembling machine at position z1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items without required ingredients
- Ensure you have the necessary ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron-gear-wheel requires iron-plate, which must be available in sufficient quantity.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when crafting with insufficient resources
- Check the recipe requirements and ensure you have enough resources to fulfill all ingredient needs before crafting.
